name: Damage

calculation_formulas.final_damage: Base Damage × (1 + Perk Bonus) × (1 + Card Bonus) × (1 + Relic Bonus)

context_fields.when_to_use: Always take when available - damage is fundamental
context_fields.priority_level: Highest - damage scales multiplicatively with other bonuses
context_fields.upgrade_priority: First priority for Standard Perk Bonus lab research
synergy_combinations: Critical Chance + Critical Factor for burst damage
Standard Perk Bonus lab research for maximum effect
counter_strategies: Essential against high-health enemies (tanks, bosses, fleet)
Scales exponentially with multiple damage sources
Combines with damage amplification effects (Amplify Bot, Berserker)
context_fields.resource_efficiency: Extremely High - multiplicative scaling makes it the most valuable perk
context_fields.formula: Total Bonus = (1 + Base Value x Quantity) x (1 + Standard Perk Bonus)

notes: Standard perk bonuses can be increased using the Standard Perk Bonus lab
